Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE® D-Dimer Calibration Verification/Linearity Test Kit
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE® D-Dimer Calibration Verification/Linearity Test Kit for quantitative determination of D-Dimer linearity and calibration verification in human plasma
Indications for Use Summary: Assayed quality control materials for in vitro diagnostic use in the quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification, and verification of reportable range for D-Dimer in clinical laboratory settings
